description: Signature Chuck Taylor All Star rubber toe, textured toe bumper, contrast midsole stripe, medial side air port holes and logo patch, and Converse All Star heel patch.
name: Converse Chuck Taylor® All Star® Street Basics Mid

features: Mid-top silhouette offers excellent ankle protection with a padded collar and tongue.
Lace-up closure with metal eyelets for a snug and durable fit.
Textile lining and a padded footbed for all-day comfort.
Rubber outsole with custom Diamond tread pattern for traction.
sizeAndWeight.size: For men's sizes, please select 1/2 size down from your normal size (if you wear Men's size 9, please choose Men's size 8.5). Women's sizes should be true to size.
